segments.text: I am completely shocked by what I’m seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes while water is overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching for cookies like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even glance down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she seems while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really tell her what’s going on before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stop staring at how bizarre this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR
